Created on Tue Aug 18 16:55:49 2020

@author: jguterl

class UEDGEToolBox.Settings.UBoxSettings(Parent=None, Debug=False, Dic=None)[source]¶

Bases: UEDGEToolBox.DataSet.UBoxDataSet

Print(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Print function allowing to print with the UBox prefix.

Example

>>> UBox.Print('Hello')
[UBox] Hello
